column5: If you were there on Sunday I am sure you saw this guy.   He wasn't shy at all.    The Mallard seemed to know that boater's carried food.  He made the rounds and hit every boat for scraps.  Turned out to be a very nice day.  The wind could be very cold at times but heated up as the day went on.   Sun was shining and I did get a not so nice sunburn but enjoyed the day.  As I stated in Glen's post, it was very quite out there with all the people and boats.  I haven't experienced that kind of quite with so many people in one spot before.  Tom
